alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 9:52AM CDT until May 13 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding begins at 18 feet, flooding of low lying pastures along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening to a crest of 19.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 11.2 Thu 9 AM 18.5 8.4 6.6 19.0 1 AM 5/12 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
